@soumith so I've fleshed out a PR where I've changed the init.py file to contain classes for each initialization and have added support for 2 string args in the layers: weight_initializer and bias_initializer.

However, I had a discussion with @apaszke and he thought we should leave that to higher level libraries and keep things the way they are.

Should I submit a PR for it in case you guys want to see it?
